name: 黃如瑩
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
I.Textbook 上課用書:  Let's Talk in English--On the Go (台灣走透透II)
II.Syllabus 每周上課課程表:
Week 1: Introduction 課程簡介
Week 2: Unit 10 (Flower Market) and review
Week 3: Listening comprehension test
Week 4 and Week 5: Units 11-12 (Astronomy Museum, Hot Spring)
Week 6: Writing skills
Week 7 and Week 8: Units 13-14 (A Bakery, A Hair Wash)
Week 9: Listening comprehension test
Week 19 and Week 11:  Units 15-16 (Zongzi, Tainan’s Great Food)
Week 12 and Week 13: Units 17-18 (Shaved Ice, Sesame Oil)
Week 14 and Week 15: Units 19-20 (The Erhu, Photography)
Week 16: Unit 21 (The Library)
Week 17: Writing skills and Review 複習
Week 18: Final exam 期末考
scorePolicy:
Percentile distribution of Final Grades 評分標準:
1.Weekly tests 週考: 15 X 3% = 45%
2. Midtern exam 期中考: 25%
3. Fianl exam 期末考: 30%
materials:
1.  Let's Talk in English--On the Go (台灣走透透I)), 空中英語教室
